DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find optimistic dose evaluate efficacy safety SK-PC-B70M patient mild moderate Alzheimer 's disease .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial SK-PC-B70M Mild Moderate Alzheimer 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Age range : 50 ~ 85 year Clinical diagnosis probable Alzheimer 's disease ( DSMIV NINCDSADRDA criterion ) MRI within last 12 month consistent diagnosis AD MMSE score 10 26 AChEI memantine discontinue least 3 month prior screen Patient mild cognitive impairment ( MCI ; CDRSB < 2.5 ) Other central nervous disease hypothyroidism , Vitamin B12/ Folic acid deficiency , hypercalcemia , neurosyphilis , AIDS T.I.A Major infarction within last 12 month Any serious disorder could limit ability patient participate study COPD asthma Any condition would make patient caregiver , opinion investigator , unsuitable study
